description: Vortex, also known as Roy Solomon, is an insane individual with anger issues and a deep-seated hatred for his nemesis, Velocity.  He's ruthless, willing to murder innocents to prove a point, and uses others as shields.  Despite his hatred of pedophiles, he manipulates them before executing them.  He possesses superhuman speed amplified by his cybernetic armor, resulting in dangerous side effects like extreme heat, electricity generation, and time dilation.
